Apple___Apple_scab.solution: Apply fungicide containing myclobutanil and ensure proper air circulation.
Apple___Apple_scab.prevention: Practice crop rotation and remove fallen leaves.

Apple___Black_rot.solution: Use copper-based fungicides and remove infected fruit.
Apple___Black_rot.prevention: Maintain good orchard hygiene and select resistant varieties.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.solution: Apply fungicides at flowering and remove cedar trees nearby.

Apple___healthy.solution: Continue regular monitoring and maintain healthy practices.

Blueberry___healthy.solution: Maintain soil pH between 4.5 and 5.5 for optimal growth.
Blueberry___healthy.prevention: Regularly check for pests and diseases.

Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.solution: Apply sulfur-based fungicides and ensure good airflow.
Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.prevention: Prune infected branches and avoid overhead watering.

Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot.solution: Apply fungicides at the first sign of disease.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot.prevention: Rotate crops and practice good field sanitation.

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.solution: Use resistant corn hybrids and apply fungicides if necessary.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.prevention: Monitor for early signs of rust in the field.

Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.solution: Apply fungicides at tasseling if conditions are favorable for disease.
Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Rotate crops and select resistant varieties.

Corn_(maize)___healthy.solution: Maintain soil fertility and monitor for pests.

Grape___Black_rot.solution: Apply fungicides during bloom and harvest affected clusters.
Grape___Black_rot.prevention: Prune properly to improve air circulation.

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).solution: Remove infected vines and apply appropriate fungicides.

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.solution: Use fungicides at the first sign of symptoms.

Orange___Huanglongbing_(Citrus_greening).solution: Remove infected trees and control psyllid vectors.
Orange___Huanglongbing_(Citrus_greening).prevention: Regularly inspect trees and maintain good cultural practices.

Peach___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Select resistant varieties and practice good sanitation.

Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.solution: Remove infected plants, apply copper-based bactericides.
Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use disease-resistant varieties, practice crop rotation.

Pepper,_bell___healthy.prevention: Regularly inspect plants for early signs of disease.

Potato___Early_blight.solution: Apply fungicides at the first sign of infection.

Potato___Late_blight.solution: Use resistant varieties, apply fungicides as needed.

Soybean___healthy.solution: Monitor for aphids and other pests.
Soybean___healthy.prevention: Practice crop rotation to manage soil health.

Squash___Powdery_mildew.solution: Apply sulfur or potassium bicarbonate when symptoms appear.
Squash___Powdery_mildew.prevention: Ensure good air circulation around plants.

Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.solution: Remove affected leaves, ensure adequate watering.
Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.prevention: Avoid overhead watering, maintain soil moisture.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.solution: Remove infected plants, apply copper-based bactericides.
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use resistant varieties, practice crop rotation.

Tomato___Early_blight.solution: Apply fungicides at the first sign of infection.

Tomato___Late_blight.solution: Use resistant varieties, apply fungicides as needed.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.solution: Improve ventilation in greenhouses, apply fungicides if necessary.
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.prevention: Avoid overcrowding plants, ensure proper watering.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.solution: Apply fungicides at the first sign of symptoms.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.prevention: Practice crop rotation and maintain good sanitation.

Tomato___Spider_mites_Two-spotted_spider.solution: Use miticides or insecticidal soap as needed.
Tomato___Spider_mites_Two-spotted_spider.prevention: Regularly monitor plants for signs of infestation.

Tomato___Target_Spot.solution: Apply fungicides when symptoms appear; remove affected leaves.
Tomato___Target_Spot.prevention: Rotate crops to prevent disease buildup.

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.solution: Remove infected plants immediately; control whitefly populations.

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.solution: Remove infected plants immediately; control aphid populations.
